neighbors.name: Patricia E. Johnson
neighbors.claims: Patricia E. Johnson is a registered landowner in the Town of Vienna, Dane County, listed at the same address as Sharon E. Haug ([Town of Vienna 2024 Assessment Roll](https://www.apraz.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/T.-Vienna-2024-Completed-Real-Estate-Assessment-Roll-1.pdf)). Public records searches of Dane County zoning hearings and Town of Vienna board minutes yield no results for Johnson participating in local development debates or testifying regarding recent solar proposals ([Dane County Legislative Information Center](https://dane.legistar.com/gateway.aspx?m=l&id=/matter.aspx?key=29474)). Consequently, her stance on renewable energy development remains undocumented in the public sphere.
neighbors.influence_justification: Local landowner; no official position found

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage as a household unit with Sharon E. Haug, as they share a mailing address. Focus on maintaining the quiet enjoyment of their property and addressing any specific concerns regarding visual buffers or construction activity near their residence.

citations.claim: Patricia E. Johnson is a registered landowner in the Town of Vienna, Dane County, listed at the same address as Sharon E. Haug
citations.title: Town of Vienna 2024 Completed Real Estate Assessment Roll (Page 60)

citations.claim: Public records searches of Dane County zoning hearings and Town of Vienna board minutes yield no results for Johnson participating in local development debates

neighbors.name: Sharon E. Haug
neighbors.claims: Sharon E. Haug is the owner of a residential/agricultural parcel in the Town of Vienna, Dane County, sharing a mailing address with Patricia E. Johnson ([Town of Vienna 2024 Assessment Roll](https://www.apraz.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/T.-Vienna-2024-Completed-Real-Estate-Assessment-Roll-1.pdf)). There is no record of Haug submitting public comments or testifying at county zoning hearings regarding renewable energy projects, indicating her position has not been publicly asserted ([Dane County Legislative Information Center](https://dane.legistar.com/gateway.aspx?m=l&id=/matter.aspx?key=29474)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private landowner; no public role found

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach Ms. Haug in conjunction with Patricia Johnson. Emphasize respect for their shared property's privacy and rural character. Provide clear information on project setbacks and visual screening to address potential concerns about viewshed impacts.

citations.claim: Sharon E. Haug is the owner of a residential/agricultural parcel in the Town of Vienna, Dane County, sharing a mailing address with Patricia E. Johnson
citations.title: Town of Vienna 2024 Completed Real Estate Assessment Roll (Page 59)

citations.claim: There is no record of Haug submitting public comments or testifying at county zoning hearings regarding renewable energy projects
citations.title: Dane County Legislative Information Center Search Results

neighbors.name: Rodney W. Caldwell
neighbors.claims: Rodney W. Caldwell is a significant landowner in the Town of Vienna, holding multiple parcels individually and under the entity Caldwell Farms AGR LLC ([Town of Vienna 2024 Assessment Roll](https://www.apraz.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/T.-Vienna-2024-Completed-Real-Estate-Assessment-Roll-1.pdf)). Assessment records list his mailing address at an apartment on Mineral Point Road in Madison, WI, suggesting he may be an absentee landowner or retired from active residence on the farm ([Town of Vienna 2024 Assessment Roll](https://www.apraz.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/T.-Vienna-2024-Completed-Real-Estate-Assessment-Roll-1.pdf)). He has a background in plant pathology, having served as an assistant professor with expertise in cereal crop diseases ([The Ohio State University History of Plant Pathology](https://plantpath.osu.edu/sites/plantpath/files/imce/images/Anniversary/Plant%20Pathology%20in%20Ohio%20Chapters%201-6.pdf)). Despite his extensive landholdings, no public records of testimony or letters to the editor regarding solar or wind development were found under his name in Dane County ([Dane County Legislative Information Center](https://dane.legistar.com/gateway.aspx?m=l&id=/matter.aspx?key=29474)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage Mr. Caldwell with a high degree of technical professionalism, acknowledging his scientific background in agriculture. Focus discussions on land stewardship, soil health preservation during construction, and the long-term viability of the farmland post-decommissioning.

citations.claim: Rodney W. Caldwell is a significant landowner in the Town of Vienna, holding multiple parcels individually and under the entity Caldwell Farms AGR LLC
citations.title: Town of Vienna 2024 Completed Real Estate Assessment Roll (Pages 9-10, 58)
